manipulators.description: iTerm2: control shift tab == cmd shift [
Outlook email: control shift backtick == command backspace - do I still need this?
Outlook email: esc == mark as read
vscode: control tab == command option right
vscode: capslock g == control g (go to line)
vscode: capslock cmd q == cmd up
vscode: capslock cmd e == cmd down
intelliJ: capslock g == cmd l (go to line)
chrome: capslock w == command t (new tab)
chrome: capslock s == nothing (noop, disable this hotkey)
capslock cmd h == shift option left
control shift backtick == command option delete
pause break == command option q (lock the screen)
capslock right click == right arrow (doesn't work when USB overdrive grabs the mouse)
